name: Warmord
description:
Warmord is a fast paced real-time tower defense game.
Build units and fortify your base. The rules are simple, defend your own fort and try to push back the enemy lines in order to destroy their fort.

  • Fight in 6 different eras
  • Various challenging maps
  • Tower-Defense mechanisms, upgrade your base to suit your playstyle
  • Attack enemies with military units of the available eras.
  • Manage your running economy behind the gates of your fort
  • Recruit different units in order to destroy the enemy fort.
